title: Are all male teachers sexist? - Quora

response.answer_text: Human society is sexist. Teachers hopefully much less so, however there may be the idea that boys are worse behaved than girls or that boys are better in the sciences than girls, still held by some members of the profession. Personally as a teacher I have found that most of my strongest science students happened to be girls (going on both subject and overall IB score) and that behaviour issued are more commonly noticed with boys, however girls are more commonly carrying out cyber bullying now. These are my recent experiences - that although classes and schools might have patterns, overall in school boys and girls are treated the same and have an een spread of strengths and issues. Male teachers are typically very aware of sexism and watch their behaviour to avoid any bias. Female teachers are complained about sometimes for being much stricter on boys than girls. As a male teacher I try to respect all students regardless of their background, gender or race. I respect them based on how they support their classmates and how much they push themselves in my class.

Hint: If your question takes the form “Are all X people Y?”, and X and Y are not synonyms, the answer is no. For example: Are all female teachers bitchy?Are all white people racist?Are all black people criminals?Are all Asians smart?Are all Quorans liberal?The answer is always no.

I am a male teacher and I take pride in having been raised to respect women and treat them as equals. As a whole, I think that it is safe to say that a great deal of all male teachers are sexist. However, I also feel that is a decreasing trend. Most of my co-workers are very much into macho things like football, heavy drinking, and the like, but their interaction witjh female teachers is professional and friendly. In the last 10 years I can only recall one example of a male sexist teacher. But he was an isolated case and most female teachers chose to ignore some sexist slurs he liked to make in public.

From my experience male teachers are far less sexist than female teachers. Generally female teachers do not even realize that their actions can be sexist. It is like blacks ( or other minorities ) saying they can not be racist because they are black. Women have the exact same idea- they cannot be sexist because they are women - completely idiotic and very sad...

Yes. Also, all politicians lie all the time, all atheists are Satan-worshipers, all the questions in the universe can be answered by “42”. You seem like a critical thinker, maybe you should meet my Nigerian friend—he’s a knight who, due to having a Nigerian bank account, needs to transfer all his money through your bank (he’ll pay you for this, of course). Everyone knows that all knights are honest.
